body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting CarZoo Customer Support. My name is Sarah Johnson. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Joan Campbell.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Joan. To assist you better, could you provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. In order to verify your account, may I have your email address as well?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email address is joan.campbell@email.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing the information, Joan. We will look into your issue regarding returns at CarZoo. Is there anything else you'd like to add?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. Just feeling a bit confused about the process.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand. We will do our best to clarify everything for you. Thank you for your time, Joan.
